page.title: 20 The Interview
page.content: ood evening this is Sharon Collins eporting at Florence Road Newcross S.E.14. Miss Angela what do you think of your house. "well its costly and warm ." How many bedrooms have you got in your house Miss Angela?"Oh just call me Angela,its better that way" Well Angela what do you think. Like how many bedrooms is there in your house,and bathrooms,wheres the toilet,kitchen and dinning room ? "Walk through the front door of course you have to open it first.Walk down the passage,turn right and then theres a door.Open it and theres the dinning room .Turn round and walk straight and theres the kitchen leading to the garden.Walk back to the dinning room and then you will see a flight of stairs,walk up,then you will see the bathroom inside first you will see the bath if you look to the right from there you will see the sink .n
